title: epic
content:
hi, is there a font like this, out there, somewhere?

thanks! ac

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015122548/http:/typophile.com/files/1_75.jpg) | 187.13 KB |
author: ac54

comments.content:
The initial font must be **[Viper Squadron Solid](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015122548/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Viper%20Squadron%20Solid%20-%20Regular&fid=db313ad4d19ca1bc1749685192ec1cc0&fsize=60&text=EPIC&fit=1)** by ShyFonts (Free for Personal Use) + the special effects.

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015122548/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
